
== Tmux ==

= Sessions =
* tmux ls - List sessions
* tmux new -s mysession - Create session with name

= Windows =
* Ctrl+space n - Next window
* Ctrl+space c - Create window
* Ctrl+space 0..9 - Go to window

= Panes =
* Ctrl+space c - Toggle last active pane
* Ctrl+space % - Split pane vertically
* Ctrl+space " - Split plane horizontally
* Ctrl+space up,down,left,right - Switch to pane in direction

= Copy mode =
* Ctrl+space [ - Enter copy mode
* Spacebar - Start selection
* Enter - Copy selection
* Ctrl+space ] - Past contents of buffer_0
